content:
Ok, so the path in system variables is correct. It appears the incorrect path is coming from user variables. I have fixed it.

Microsoft Windows [Version 10.0.26100.3194]
(c) Microsoft Corporation. All rights reserved.

C:\Windows\System32>echo %PATH%
C:\Program Files\Python313\Scripts;C:\Program Files\Python313;C:\Program Files\Git\cmd;C:\Program Files (x86)\Google\Cloud SDK\google-cloud-sdk\bin;C:\Users\jesse\AppData\Roaming\Python\Python313\Scripts;C:\Users\jesse\AppData\Local\Muse Hub\lib

C:\Windows\System32>
